TitlePage.Title: AutomataGroups
TitlePage.Subtitle: Package for computations in groups generated by finite automata
TitlePage.Author: Yevgen Muntyan muntyan@math.tamu.edu
Dmytro Savchuk savchuk@math.tamu.edu http://www.math.tamu.edu/~savchuk
TitlePage.Address:
Department of Mathematics
Texas A&M University
College Station, 77843
TX, USA
TitlePage.Abstract: This is a manual for an &autgps; package, implementing in &GAP; basic functions and algorithms for groups generated by finite automata, contracting groups.
TitlePage.Copyright: ©right; 2006 by Yevgen Muntyan and Dmytro Savchuk
TitlePage.Acknowledgements: The development of this package was partially supported by National Science Foundation
TitlePage.Colophon: The project was originally started in 2000 mostly for personal use. It was gradually expadnig during consequent years, including both addition of new algorithms and simplification of user interface. It was used in the process of classification of groups generated by $3$-state automata over 2-letter alphabet
